articles.author: TOI Sports Desk
articles.title: 2nd Test: India regain advantage on unreal 23-wicket opening day battle at Newlands - Times of India
articles.description: Cricket News: South Africa closed an extraordinary see-saw first day of the second and final Test against India at Newlands on 62 for three in their second innings,
articles.content: Indian bowlers face tall task, Rohit seeks redemption
